info.title: Reviews and Ratings API
info.description: Reviews and Ratings is a VTEX IO native solution that allows shoppers to submit reviews and ratings for products, as well as see them while navigating the store.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

get.description: Retrieves the rating of a specific product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

totalCount.description: Total amount of ranting of the product.

get.description: Retrieves information of a product review by its ID.

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Review ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

verifiedPurchaser.description: If the reviewer is a verified purchaser (`true`) or not (`false`).

approved.description: If the review was approved (`true`) or not (`false`).

pastReviews.description: Past reviews of the same product.

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Review ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

schema.description: If the review was deleted (`true`) or not (`false`).

patch.description: Updates the information of a review.

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Review ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

If the reviewer is a verified purchaser (`true`) or not (`false`).

approved.description: If the review was approved (`true`) or not (`false`).

pastReviews.description: Past reviews of the same product.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Returns Reviews that contain the search term in `productId`, `sku`, `shopperId`, or `reviewerName`.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Zero base starting record number, `0` is the default value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Zero base ending record number, `3` is the default value.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Case-sensitive fieldName to order records (optionally add `:asc` or `:desc`).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the review, approved (`true`) or not (`false`).

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Filter the reviews by product ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

verifiedPurchaser.description: If the reviewer is a verified purchaser (`true`) or not (`false`).

approved.description: If the review was approved (`true`) or not (`false`).

pastReviews.description: Past reviews of the same product.

total.description: Total number of reviews on the list.
